titles.title: Christ Liveth In Me (easy nice - need to pract

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Christ liveth in me Brothers (Christ liveth in me) Christ liveth in me Brothers (Christ liveth in me) O what a salvation this That Christ liveth in me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Once far from God and dead in sin No light my heart could see But in God's Word the light I found Now Christ liveth in me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}As rays of light from yonder sun The flow'rs of Earth set free So life and light and love came forth From Christ living in me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}As lives the flow'r within the seed As in the cone the tree So praise the God of truth and grace His Spirit dwelleth in me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}With longing all my heart is filled That like Him I may be As on the wondrous thought I dwell That Christ liveth in me{/lang-eng}
